props.name: modelValue
props.description:
Will be set to a `FileList` containing the selected files when the user changes their selection.
In most cases you should use `v-model` instead of setting this prop directly.

props.name: id
props.description: The ID of the input. If you don't provide an ID, one will be generated automatically.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the input, which is submitted with the form data.

props.name: describedBy
props.description:
One or more element IDs to add to the `aria-describedby` attribute, used to provide additional descriptive
information for screenreader users.

props.name: accept
props.description: A comma-separated list of filetypes to accept. See [the accept attribute on MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/accept).

props.name: disabled
props.description: If `true`, file input will be disabled

props.name: multiple
props.description: If `true`, the user will be allowed to select multiple files. This won't stop users from dragging and dropping multiple files, so you should still validate the length of your `v-model` if you're only expecting one file.

props.name: formGroupClass
props.description: Classes to add to the form group. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: label
props.description: Text to use within the label. If content is provided in the `label` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: labelIsPageHeading
props.description: Whether the label also acts as the heading for the page.

props.name: labelClass
props.description: Classes to add to the label tag. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: hint
props.description: Text to use within the hint. If content is provided in the `hint` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: hintClass
props.description: Classes to add to the hint span tag. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: errorMessage
props.description: Text to use within the error message. If content is provided in the `error-message` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: errorMessageClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the error message `

` tag. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: errorMessageVisuallyHiddenText
props.description:
A visually hidden prefix used before the error message.

Defaults to `'Error'`.

props.name: beforeInput
props.description: Text to add before the input. If content is provided in the `before-input` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: afterInput
props.description: Text to add after the input. If content is provided in the `after-input` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: chooseFilesButtonText
props.description: The text of the button that opens the file picker. If content is provided in the `choose-files-button` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: dropInstructionText
props.description: The text informing users they can drop files. If content is provided in the `drop-instruction` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: multipleFilesChosenText
props.description: The text displayed when multiple files have been chosen by the user. The component will replace the ${count} placeholder with the number of files selected. If content is provided in the `multiple-files-chosen` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: noFileChosenText
props.description: The text displayed when no file has been chosen by the user. If content is provided in the `no-file-chosen` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: enteredDropZoneText
props.description: The text announced by assistive technology when user drags files and enters the drop zone.

props.name: leftDropZoneText
props.description: The text announced by assistive technology when user drags files and leaves the drop zone without dropping.

slots.name: label
slots.description: The content of the label. If content is provided in this slot, the `label` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: hint
slots.description: The content of the hint. If content is provided in this slot, the `hint` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: error-message
slots.description: The content of the error message. If content is provided in this slot, the `errorMessage` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: before-input
slots.description: Content to add before the input. If content is provided in this slot, the `beforeInput` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: no-file-chosen
slots.description: The text displayed when no file has been chosen by the user. If content is provided in this slot, the `noFileChosenText` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: drop-instruction
slots.description: The text informing users they can drop files. If content is provided in this slot, the `dropInstructionText` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: after-input
slots.description: Content to add after the input. If content is provided in this slot, the `afterInput` prop will be ignored.
